backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing frontend hero image update and listing associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH custom color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and setting basic metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling the Hero, OpeningLetter, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundAudioP: Audio player component providing autoplay attempt, play/pause control, and floating UI button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing attribution link and current year with a small decorative layout.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with background image, overlay text, scroll indicator, and audio player.
frontend/src/components/OpeningLetter.ts: Card-styled letter section displaying a formatted date, multi-paragraph message, and signature.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider handling authentication, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks with no current logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with imported fonts and a warm letter-inspired color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, animations, custom colors, fonts, shadows, and theme extensions.
